events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but decided I want to return it because it doesn't fit me well. Please advise on how to get a refund.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for returning their product and receiving money back.
An agent specialized in returns and refunds has been assigned to assist the customer with their jacket return.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging?
The order number is 45876231. The jacket is brand new, still with tags attached, and I have all the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. You can ship the jacket back using our prepaid return label. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick instructions and the prepaid label for the return.
I've sent the prepaid return label to your email. Please check it, and let us know if you need any further help with your refund.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund for your returned jacket. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation and for shopping with us.
We have sent a quick survey to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on your return and refund experience.
